data.name: About
data.value: About Us

data.name: AboutUs
data.value: About Us

data.name: AboutUsDescription1
data.value: Our company, authorized by the Ministry of Labor and Social Security as a Joint Health and Safety Unit (OSGB), was established to provide innovative and reliable solutions to the business world.

data.name: AboutUsDescription2
data.value: Our mission is to create a healthy and safe working environment in workplaces, supporting businesses in fully meeting their legal obligations. Since our establishment, we have earned our customers’ trust through services in areas such as risk assessments, comprehensive occupational health and safety training, environmental measurements, emergency planning, periodic health screenings, and more. By ensuring full compliance with regulations, we enable businesses to prioritize not only their legal obligations but also the health and well-being of their employees.

data.name: AboutUsDescription3
data.value: We aim to take OSGB services a step further by acting as a bridge collaborating with companies. We provide tailored solutions for each customer’s needs, streamline business processes, and build a sustainable safety culture. Employee health and customer satisfaction are the cornerstones of our operations. With this awareness, we leverage the latest technological opportunities to develop innovative approaches and take a leading role in the industry.

data.name: AboutUsDescription4
data.value: Our company aims to grow with you and add value to the business world. We take pride in being by your side for all your occupational health and safety needs, always striving to offer the best with our professional team. The strong bonds we have built with the businesses that trust us are the greatest proof of our success.

data.name: CallMeBack

data.name: CancellationChange
data.value: Cancellation and Change Requests

data.name: CancellationChangeItem1
data.value: Cancellation or change requests before the service begins must be communicated to our company in writing (via email or official letter) at least five (5) business days before the service start date.

data.name: CancellationChangeItem2
data.value: Cancellation requests reported within this period are considered valid, and the full service fee paid is refunded to the customer without deductions within 7 business days.

data.name: CancellationChangeItem3
data.value: Cancellation requests made less than 5 business days before the service start date will not be considered, and the paid fee will not be refunded. However, the service scope can be modified upon the customer’s request.

data.name: CancellationChangeItem4
data.value: For change requests (e.g., extending the service duration or requesting additional staff), our company will make additional planning and respond to the customer within a maximum of 3 business days.

data.name: CollectedDataPurpose1
data.value: To ensure our services are provided completely and on time

data.name: CollectedDataPurpose2
data.value: To meet customer requests and plan service processes

data.name: CollectedDataPurpose3
data.value: To measure customer satisfaction and improve service quality

data.name: CollectedDataPurpose4
data.value: To fulfill legal obligations

data.name: CollectedDataPurpose5
data.value: To communicate with you and provide information when necessary

data.name: CollectedDataPurposes
data.value: Collected Personal Data and Purposes

data.name: CollectedDataPurposesText
data.value: Your personal data is collected through forms filled out during your service request, email correspondence, phone calls, payment transactions, and on-site inspections at your workplace.

data.name: CollectedDataRestriction
data.value: Your personal data is never used for purposes other than those specified above and is not processed for any transactions not aligned with these purposes.

data.name: CostAdvantage
data.value: Providing cost advantages to businesses with suitable OSGB selections.

data.name: CustomerRightsFeedback
data.value: Customer Rights and Feedback

data.name: CustomerRightsFeedbackItem1
data.value: Our customers can report any issues or dissatisfaction encountered during the service process to our 24/7 accessible customer service team.

data.name: CustomerRightsFeedbackItem2
data.value: Feedback is thoroughly reviewed within a maximum of 2 business days, and solution proposals are presented to the customer.

data.name: CustomerRightsFeedbackItem3
data.value: Customer satisfaction is our company’s top priority.

data.name: DataCollectionMethod
data.value: Data Collection Method

data.name: DataCollectionMethodText
data.value: Your personal data is collected through forms filled out during your service request, email correspondence, phone calls, payment transactions, and on-site inspections at your workplace. Your data is processed based on your explicit consent or within the framework of legal obligations. During data collection, you are clearly informed about which information is collected and why, and your consent is obtained for optional fields.

data.name: DataRetentionPeriod
data.value: Data Retention Period

data.name: DataRetentionPeriodText
data.value: Your personal data is retained for the duration of the service and in accordance with legal retention periods.

data.name: DataSecurityDesign
data.value: These measures are designed to minimize the risk of your data being lost, stolen, or used by unauthorized individuals.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasure1
data.value: Data collected electronically is protected with advanced encryption methods (e.g., SSL certificate and AES-256 encryption) and can only be accessed by authorized personnel.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasure2
data.value: Physical documents are stored in locked cabinets and secure archive rooms, with strict monitoring of access and exits.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasure3
data.value: Our databases are continuously monitored against unauthorized access and protected by firewalls.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasure4
data.value: We have emergency plans in place for potential data breaches, and in such cases, we are committed to notifying you and the relevant authorities within 72 hours as per KVKK regulations.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasure5
data.value: Our staff is regularly trained on our privacy policies and KVKK regulations, and they are made aware of data security.

data.name: DataSecurityMeasures
data.value: Data Security and Protection Measures

data.name: DataSecurityMeasuresIntro
data.value: Our company takes the latest technological and physical measures to ensure the security of your personal data:

data.name: DataSharingException1
data.value: With official authorities for fulfilling legal obligations (e.g., court order or ministry request)

data.name: DataSharingException2
data.value: With OSGB experts collaborating on a part of the service (in which case, the experts are also bound by KVKK-compliant confidentiality agreements)

data.name: DataSharingIntro
data.value: Our company does not share your personal data with third parties except for legal obligations. However, data sharing may occur in the following exceptional cases:

data.name: DataSharingRestriction
data.value: When data sharing with third parties is necessary, only the minimum required data is transferred, and these parties are required to adhere to the same security standards.

data.name: DataSharingThirdParties
data.value: Data Sharing and Relations with Third Parties

data.name: DeliveryCondition1
data.value: The service start date and schedule are notified to the Buyer via email or phone.

data.name: DeliveryCondition2
data.value: In case of possible delays, the Seller informs the Buyer within 24 hours and offers alternative solutions.

data.name: DeliveryCondition3
data.value: The Seller provides the necessary personnel and technical infrastructure to ensure uninterrupted service continuation.

data.name: DeliveryConditions
data.value: Delivery Conditions

data.name: DeliveryConditionsText
data.value: The Seller initiates the service delivery within a maximum of 5 (five) business days after payment approval and contract establishment.

data.name: DeliveryProcess
data.value: Delivery Process

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem1
data.value: Our company provides Common Health and Safety Unit (OSGB) services within the dates and conditions specified in the detailed written contract with the customer.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem2
data.value: The service start date is communicated to the customer in writing within a maximum of two (2) business days after payment confirmation and contract signing by both parties. Additionally, the service implementation schedule and stages are shared in detail.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem3
data.value: Payment can be made in full or in installments before the service begins. The payment plan is clearly specified in the contract and approved by the customer.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem4
data.value: Service delivery is carried out by expert teams assigned by OSGB, including regular inspections, trainings, and reports within the scope of occupational health and safety (OHS) projects.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem5
data.value: In case of potential delays due to technical issues, staff shortages, or unforeseen circumstances during the delivery process, our company provides solutions within 24 hours and informs the customer. Backup plans are activated to ensure uninterrupted service.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem6
data.value: In case of changes in the customer’s workplace conditions (e.g., an increase in the number of employees or identification of a new risk), the service scope is reviewed and updated without additional fees.

data.name: DeliveryProcessItem7
data.value: At every stage of the service, regular progress reports (monthly or project-based) are provided to the customer. These reports include the work performed, identified risks, and solution recommendations.

data.value: Delivery and Return Terms

data.name: DisputeResolution
data.value: Dispute Resolution

data.name: DisputeResolutionText
data.value: In disputes arising from the Contract, the parties first seek a solution in good faith. If no solution is reached, the Consumer Arbitration Committee or Consumer Courts at the Buyer’s place of residence are authorized.

data.name: DistanceSale
data.value: Distance Sale Contract

data.name: DistanceSaleContract
data.value: Distance Sale Contract

data.name: DistanceSaleContractDescription
data.value: This Distance Sale Contract (\"Contract\") is drawn up between the parties specified below for online purchase transactions between our company’s website and your company for OSGB services. It is prepared in accordance with Law No. 6502 on Consumer Protection and the Distance Contracts Regulation, clearly regulating the rights and obligations of the buyer and seller. The contract becomes binding between the parties upon the purchase of the service.

data.name: ReturnCancellation
data.value: Return and Cancellation Conditions

data.name: ReturnCancellationItem1
data.value: The Buyer notifies the Seller by providing documentation.

data.name: ReturnCancellationItem2
data.value: The Seller addresses the deficiency within 48 hours or provides compensation services.

data.name: ReturnCancellationItem3
data.value: If the deficiency cannot be resolved, the full paid amount or the amount corresponding to the deficiency is refunded within 7 business days.

data.name: ReturnCancellationText
data.value: Return is not possible after the service has started.

data.name: ReturnGuarantee
data.value: Service Refund and Guarantee

data.name: ReturnGuaranteeItem1
data.value: Due to the nature of the service, a refund is not possible after it has started. However, if the service provided by our company is incomplete or inadequate, the customer can report this to our company with documentation.

data.name: ReturnGuaranteeItem2
data.value: In case deficiencies are identified, our company provides additional support or free compensatory service within 48 hours. The customer incurs no additional costs during this process.

data.name: ReturnGuaranteeItem3
data.value: Upon detection of deficiencies, our company provides additional support within 48 hours or offers free compensation services.

data.name: RightOfWithdrawal
data.value: Right of Withdrawal

data.name: RightOfWithdrawalItem1
data.value: The Buyer notifies the Seller of the withdrawal request in writing (via email or registered letter).

data.name: RightOfWithdrawalItem2
data.value: The paid amount is refunded to the Buyer without interruption within 10 (ten) business days from the withdrawal notification.

data.name: RightOfWithdrawalItem3
data.value: The right of withdrawal cannot be exercised after the service has started; in this case, return and cancellation conditions apply.

data.name: RightOfWithdrawalNote
data.value: The right of withdrawal may become invalid if the Buyer explicitly consents to the early start of the service.

data.name: RightOfWithdrawalText
data.value: The Buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal within 14 (fourteen) days before the service starts, due to the nature of the service.

data.name: YourRightsKVKK
data.value: Your Rights Under KVKK

data.name: YourRightsKVKKIntro
data.value: Under Law No. 6698, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

data.value: Creating clean, fast, and safe working environments with a zero-accident vision.
